pages.title: ⍟ Five of Pentacles ⍟
pages.text: Spirit of Material Trouble$(br)     ☿ Mercury in ♉ Taurus

A vagrant walking barefoot through a snow-storm with only a thin blanket to protect him from the bleak winter.$(br)  They pass by a stained glass window exuding warm light, oblivious to the five pentacles in its elaborate design.$(br)  Because they are so focused on their hardship, they fail to see that help is available to them inside the temple; and so continue on in their desperate journey.$(br)  Sometimes people may wallow

waiting on a miracle, when really, they need only ask for help to change their fortune. $(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Loss, material troubles.$(br)  Being engrossed into an emotional situation, oblivious to the help at hand.$(br)  Possible sickness.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Recovery among chaos, taking action to better your situation.$(br)  Sometimes lavishness.
